version_description: - General improvements
Hello Chitter's awesome users! This update contains some bugs fixes and general improvements, enjoy!
Hello Chitter chatters :D, this update contains bugs fixes and performance enhancement, the app consumes less battery now with more speed & efficiency, enjoy!
Hello :D, this version contains bugs fixes and general little improvements. Stay tuned for the coming features which we are building now!
App optimization

I hope you can read this comment, as we'd like to remind you that we are working hard to improve your experience :$, this version contains:
- General enhancements (performance & UI)
- improving user moderation mechanism

Hello guys :D,

We are working hard to improve the experience and resolve all the bugs you have reported, we are also working on providing more features soon, stay tuned!
We are trying our best to optimize the user experience, so this build is trying to optimize it with different tweaks

Hello guys :D, we have been listening closely to what you are suggesting and got you an update with:

- Bugs fixes
- Voice notes noise cancellation
- Voice calls between contacts

Stay tuned for our future updates!

Hello guys :D, we are working hard to improve your experience, this version contains:
- General enhancements
- Showing whether the media (image/video) was sent from camera or album

I hope you can read this comment, as we'd like to remind you that we are working hard to improve your experience :$, this version contains:
- General enhancements (performance & UI)
- improving user moderation mechanism

Hello guys, we are listening carefully to what you guys are suggesting, this version contains:
- The terrible crash fix which many of you complained about
- Send button not working fix
- General enhancements

Hello guys :D,
We have been working hard to improve your experience, this update contains:
- Notifications fix
- Blocking controls enhancement
- Bug fixes
We would like to thank "Sara" who helped us debug multiple issues and release this version

Hello guys, we are working hard on improving the app and are preparing big changes that will be coming soon, but for now these are just minor fixes here and there:
- Crashes fix
- Restoring purchase had a minor issue which is now fixed

Hello guys :D, this build contains:
- Bug fixes
- Slight design changes

Hello guys,
We have been listening to your suggestions to improve your experience, this build contains:
- Spam detection improvements
- Voice calls enhancement

Hello guys,

This version only contains bug fixes, voice calls enhancement. However, we are working on a major update with very cool design & awesome new features, stay tuned!

- New subscriptions
- Voice enhancement

Hello guys :D,

We hope you are all fine in these strange times. We have been working in the past couple of months on this new major update, it has a new amazing design, a better chatting experience, and a fantastic new feature (chitter links), you can basically have your own chitter link, share it anywhere, and let others chat with you anonymously!

Hello guys,

We have been paying close attention to all of your reports since our last update and we think we fixed most of the bugs/issues, this version contains:
- Fixed the bug where scrolling caused a conversation deletion animation
- Fixed the bug where it doesn't show that other user left
- Fixed the bug where it doesn't show the messaging textfield
- Fixed the bug where gifs don't seem to be moving after sending them

We are doing our best & doing all we can to make Chitter great and awesome for all of you, and thank you very much for your support and reviews!

Hello guys,

We have been paying close attention to all of your reports since our last update and we think we fixed most of the bugs/issues, this version contains:
- Fixed the bug where scrolling caused a conversation deletion animation
- Fixed the bug where it doesn't show that other user left
- Fixed the bug where it doesn't show the messaging textfield
- Fixed the bug where gifs don't seem to be moving after sending them

We are doing our best & doing all we can to make Chitter great and awesome for all of you, and thank you very much for your support and reviews!

Hello guys :D,

We have been working hard to release this version for you, it contains many bug fixes reported by you and:
- You can swipe to skip the other user (we fixed the bug where it was possible to unintentionally leave by swiping)

Hello guys :D,

We have been listening carefully to all of your comments & suggestions and took them into consideration in developing this version, it contains:
- Enhanced workflow for account safety (few users have unfortunately lost their accounts because they disabled iCloud syncing and didn't set a password, the new workflow should make this less likely to happen)
- Bug fixes
- Crash fixes

Hello guys :D,

We have been listening carefully to what you all were saying and are working hard to meet your expectations, this version contains:

- Reply to specific messages (by long-pressing on the message or swiping)
- Bugs fixes

Hey guys :D,

We are constantly working to improve the app and make it exceeds your expectations, this update contains:
- Reply to certain messages (by swiping or long-pressing)
- Performance enhancement
- Bug and crash fixes

Hello guys, we are doing all we can to make everything right for you, this update contains:
- Bugs fixes
- Anonymous message reply

- Enhanced chitter link sharing
- Bugs fixing

Hello guys :D,

We are constantly reading your comments and suggestions, we are aware many issues facing some users and are working on it as fast as we can, this version contains:
- Connectivity improvement
- Bugs fixes

Hello guys,

This build contains the major crash fix which made some users unable to use the app, we are very sorry about that!

Hello guys!

We hear ya! There were many bugs affecting your experience and we didn't notice them initially from our side. Luckily, we knew about them because of your reports and tried our best to fix them all. This build contains many bugs fixes and improvements, sorry for the inconvenience and we promise you to do our best :D

Hey everyone!

The app has been greatly improved with this update, it should contain a fix for many issues especially connection-related ones. Thank you and stay tuned for more!

Hello guys,
this build contains the following:
- General improvements
- Fixed a bug where notifications are not received
- Fixed a bug where the app freezes after launch

Hey :D,

We hear you all, we are doing our best to fix the issues you guys are reporting, this includes:
- Notifications not working
- App freezing

We have been also working on a new matching mechanism, it will be rolled out partially at the beginning to see what you guys think about it, if all is fine, it will be rolled out to everyone.

We appreciate your support and suggestions

Hello everyone,

This update contains a crash fix that happens to some older iOS users, sorry about that!

Hello guys :D,

We fixed a bug affecting some king subscription users along with other improvements

- Crash fixes
- Performance enhancement

- Crash fixes
- Performance enhancement
